replies.body:
Hey Oceania! Come join OCE's largest Discord Server, we have giveaways and much more!

Join - https://discord.gg/pW8EuX4

Great... Why don't you just f**k fiddle up even more and make him only viable as a jungler. All you needed to do deal with the poke Riot was is increase the E cool-down NOT f**kin nerf the damage. if you going to nerf damage on E then give it back bonus damage to lane minions so Fiddle is one again viable as a Mid mage

I agree... {{champion:9}} should've just had his E reworked to do less damage against **champions** early, but scale to the normal ratios at higher levels... Keeping the damage on farm is important for {{champion:9}} if he wants to play Mid/Jungle
Agreed. BS change. And the nerf to support items doesn't help either.

Well it’s been done bc he does too much damage as a support, I would have done both slightly nerfed damage on the E and a little bit more cooldown. It’s too hard to get close with a fiddle around, especially if you’re a melee support or short ranged or squishy. Nerfing the support items alone are not a good choice. Affects too many other supports just for one champ. Bonus minion/monster damage however is a good idea.
After the patch the number of emotes in my collection has gone down a bunch. Every legend and event emote and any others that I can't see anymore.
Should fix the bug where hexdrinker doesnt activate 90% of the time
I sure hope Lee's q and the snowball dash has been fixed. I can't actually see them travelling, if not moving backwards.
Enough chat about all the Lux skins. Just look at how many epic+ skins Cait and MF have now.
Please revert the support item changes. I am sick of vsing ap poke champions in lane. It is not healthy for the game.
Any reason why zilean's recommended support items list Spellthief's with refillable for starting items when that is no longer an option due to price changes?
